channel.title: Actinidia Chinensis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Actinidia Chinensis on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcALMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc03208 Gene Symbol: AcALMT1 Gene Name: Al-ACTIVATED MALATE TRANSPORTER Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: An Al-ACTIVATED MALATE TRANSPORTER gene (AcALMT1) was identified as a candidate responsible for citrate accumulation.

item.title: AcBFT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc28037 Gene Symbol: AcBFT2 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: CRISPR-Cas9-mediated mutagenesis of kiwifruit BFT genes results in an evergrowing but not early flowering phenotype.

item.title: AceGBF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DTZ79_15g00300/Actinidia27344 Gene Symbol: AceGBF3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AceGGP3 was identified as the most highly expressed GGP in Actinidia eriantha fruit, which has high fruit AsA.

item.title: AceGGP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc18653.1 Gene Symbol: AceGGP3 Gene Name: GDP-L-galactose phosphorylase 3 Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AceGGP3 was identified as the most highly expressed GGP in Actinidia eriantha fruit, which has high fruit AsA.

item.title: AceMYBS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DTZ79_16g09490/Actinidia31027 Gene Symbol: AceMYBS1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Overexpression and gene-editing show AceMYBS1 effectively increases AsA accumulation.

item.title: AcERF182
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc04742 Gene Symbol: AcERF182 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcERF182 may play an important role in the accumulation of soluble sugar metabolism via direct regulation of the transcription of AcBAM3.

item.title: AchnbZIP29
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn340751 Gene Symbol: AchnbZIP29 Gene Name: basic leucine zipper transcription factor 29 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Through subcellular localization analysis in this work, AchnbZIP29 and AchnMYB70 transcription factors were observed to be localized in the nucleus.

item.title: AchnFAR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn107181 Gene Symbol: AchnFAR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: MYB41, MYB107, and MYC2 promote ABA-mediated primary fatty alcohol accumulation via activation of AchnFAR in wound suberization in kiwifruit.

item.title: AchnMYB107
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn267491 Gene Symbol: AchnMYB107 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: The positive role of TFs, including AchnMYB41, AchnMYB107, and AchnMYC2, in the regulation of AchnFAR was identified.

item.title: AchnMYB41
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn345001 Gene Symbol: AchnMYB41 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: The positive role of TFs, including AchnMYB41, AchnMYB107, and AchnMYC2, in the regulation of AchnFAR was identified.

item.title: AchnMYB70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn117821 Gene Symbol: AchnMYB70 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Through subcellular localization analysis in this work, AchnbZIP29 and AchnMYB70 transcription factors were observed to be localized in the nucleus.

item.title: AchnMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn104421 Gene Symbol: AchnMYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: The positive role of TFs, including AchnMYB41, AchnMYB107, and AchnMYC2, in the regulation of AchnFAR was identified.

item.title: AcHZP45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcHZP45 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcHZP45 is a repressor of chlorophyll biosynthesis and activator of chlorophyll degradation in kiwifruit.

item.title: AcKUP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ach02g251101.2 Gene Symbol: AcKUP2 Gene Name: K+ transporter KT/HAK/KUP 2 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-induced potassium transporter AcKUP2 gene is involved in kiwifruit postharvest ripening.

item.title: AcMADS68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcMADS68 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: A new SEP gene, AcMADS68, was identified as a regulatory candidate for anthocyanin biosynthesis in the kiwifruit by transcriptome data and bioinformatic analyses.

item.title: AcNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: A dramatic decline in fruit citrate induced by mutagenesis of a NAC transcription factor, AcNAC1.

item.title: AcNAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc08288 Gene Symbol: AcNAC4 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcNAC4 regulates the transcription of AcAAT10 by binding to and activating its promoter.

item.title: AcTPR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ach25g228601.2-TA Gene Symbol: AcTPR2 Gene Name: TOPLESS-RELATED 2 Genome: (Ach25g228601.

item.title: AdMsrB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc04318 Gene Symbol: AdMsrB1 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AdMsrB1 is a novel ethylene-regulated gene expressed in ripening kiwifruit.

item.title: AdNAC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc26399 Gene Symbol: AdNAC2 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: AdNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc13705 Gene Symbol: AdNAC72 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: F3GGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GGT1 Gene Name: anthocyanidin 3-O-galactoside-2′’-O-xylosyltransferase Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: F3GT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GT1 Gene Name: flavonoid 3-0-galactosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.
